message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $850,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $750,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low.  $780,000 is my absolute bottom line. Let's meet in the middle.  I'm confident this product will be worth every penny to you.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but I still believe I should be able to purchase the product for less. I am willing to pay $760,000 for it. I hope this brings us closer to an agreement.
Bob, I'm willing to come down a bit more. $770,000 is my final offer. This is a great deal for both of us, and I'm confident you'll see the value in this product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $765,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our interests.
Bob, I understand your position.  Let's split the difference.  $770,000 and we're done. This is a great deal for both of us, and I'm confident you'll see the value in this product.
